heisenberg_uncertainty_principle.name: heisenberg_uncertainty_principle
heisenberg_uncertainty_principle.contents: #quantum_mechanics #physics states that certain properties of a particle cannot be precisely known at the same time, a key concept in @quantum_mechanics

bohr_model.name: bohr_model
bohr_model.contents: #quantum_mechanics #physics an early model of the atom that introduced energy quantization, building upon the work of @max_planck

thermal_radiation.name: thermal_radiation
thermal_radiation.contents: #black_body_radiation #physics radiation emitted by all objects at temperatures above absolute zero, related to @black_body_radiation

schrodinger_equation.name: schrodinger_equation
schrodinger_equation.contents: #quantum_mechanics #mathematics a mathematical equation that describes the time-evolution of a quantum system, crucial for understanding phenomena like @quantum_entanglement

max_planck.name: max_planck
max_planck.contents: #founder_of_quantum_theory #physics introduced the concept of quantized energy through the Planck constant, leading to the development of @quantum_mechanics

quantum_entanglement.name: quantum_entanglement
quantum_entanglement.contents: #quantum_mechanics #physics a phenomenon where particles become interconnected in such a way that their properties are correlated, often studied using the @schrodinger_equation

photoelectric_effect.name: photoelectric_effect
photoelectric_effect.contents: #quantum_mechanics #physics demonstrates the particle nature of light through the emission of electrons from a metal surface, which led to the development of @quantum_mechanics

wave_particle_duality.name: wave_particle_duality
wave_particle_duality.contents: #quantum_mechanics #physics describes the ability of particles to exhibit both wave-like and particle-like behavior, a fundamental aspect of @quantum_mechanics
